alert.note: Alert for De Kalb; Jackson; Overton; Putnam; White (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 3:31PM CDT until July 07 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OVERTON...EASTERN DE KALB...SOUTHEASTERN JACKSON... WHITE AND PUTNAM COUNTIES... At 331 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Livingston to Cookeville to 9 miles east of Smithville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cookeville, Sparta, Livingston, Gainesboro, Algood, Baxter, Doyle, Hamptons Crossroads, Bakers Crossroads, Burgess Falls State Park, Rickman and Cummins Falls State Park. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 273 and 299. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: De Kalb; Jackson; Overton; Putnam; White
